actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize a study for the purpose of determining the feasibility and desirability of designating the Daniel Boone Trail as a national scenic trail.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of Agriculture to conduct studies to determine the feasibility and desirability of designating the Daniel Boone Trail in North Carolina, Tennessee, Virginia, and Kentucky as a national scenic trail under the National Trails System Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a study for the purpose of determining the feasibility and desirability of designating the Daniel Boone Trail as a national scenic trail.
